text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActClass where concept is-a INC

name: ActClassIncident
title: ActClassIncident
description: An event that occurred outside of the control of one or more of the parties involved. Includes the concept of an accident.
